basics.name: Cole Amparo
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: Data Analyst with a focus on QA and Data Labeling/Annotation for Alexa LLM Agents. Passionate about all things Data and AI, with a strongsuit in teamwork and communication.

work.summary: Data Analyst with a focus on QA and Data Labeling/Annotation for Alexa LLM Agents.
highlights: Collaborate with Development and Project Managers to ensure the quality and testability of AI-driven projects.
Manage QA coverage for AI-based projects, planning test passes and triaging issues to resolution.
Communicate updates via meetings and asynchronous channels to keep stakeholders informed.
Conduct root cause analysis and data validation to enhance data processes and ensure test results meet standards.
Create and support test dashboards/reports, providing insights and feedback on quality issues.

work.summary: Project Manager for a Telebehavorial Health System deployed in Phillipines Military Bases
highlights: Conducted interviews with stakeholders and end-users to see if there were any existing solutions, limitations,  and wants/needs.
Developed and implemented the policy framework as a MVP for deployed mental telehealth care in the 25th ID, providing guidelines and procedures for effective delivery of telehealth services.

work.company: Hawaii Department of Labor and Industrial Relations
highlights: Worked with various clients to fix Login & Information Security Issues
Self-Coordinated and Led the roll out of 300+ devices by communicating with client side and team members

awards.title: UH Manoa Dean's List
awards.summary: Completed every semester from 2019 with more than 12 credits per, with a 3.5+ GPA
